column4: Im on a livecd. HDD damaged. 1gb RAM memory only. Hence Ive removed compiz, oo and some other apps to save memory. I also wish to remove metacity and run something like jwm. Please suggest method. I cannot obviously restart the PC now running 10.4 livecd.
Ive also installed atop, smem to see mem usage. Any suggestions here please?
you want to make a customised livecd?
nope. Just buying time till I get my HDD back.
